mapper.sql: questionid, userid, pid, pname, purl, question_content, create_time, reply_status, reply_content, reply_time, reply_name, isShow
mapper.update: update question_answer set isShow=#{type} where questionid=#{pid}
mapper.select: SELECT q.questionid,u.id,q.userid,q.question_content,q.reply_content,u.email,ad.email AS sale_email FROM question_answer q INNER JOIN USER u ON q.userid=u.id LEFT JOIN admuser ad ON q.reply_name=ad.id WHERE q.questionid=${qid}

update.if: update question_answer set reply_status=2 where questionid=#{qid}
update question_answer set reply_status=1 where questionid=#{qid}
update question_answer set isShow=2 where questionid=#{qid}
update question_answer set isShow=1 where questionid=#{qid}
